text:
nO# rIriShOq mA parA# dAH || 
yE na#H saqpatnAq apaqtE Ba#vantvindrAq-gniByAqmava# bAdhAmahEq tAn |
vasa#vO ruqdrA A#diqtyA u#pariq spRuSaM# mOqgraM cEttA#ramadhi rAqjama#krann || 
aqrvA~jcaq mindra#maqmutO# havAmahEq yO gOqjid-dha#naq-jida#Svaq-jidyaH | 
iqmannO# yaqj~jaM ~Mvi#haqvE ju#ShasvAqsya ku#rmO harivO mEqdinaM# tvA || 32 
(vaqniqShaqntaq - puqrastAqn - mA - trica#tvAri(gm)Sacca) (A14)
